thread.title: ClubCorp and YMCA of Metro Atlanta Present 5th Annual Y Golf Open
thread.title_full: ClubCorp and YMCA of Metro Atlanta Present 5th Annual Y Golf Open

title: ClubCorp and YMCA of Metro Atlanta Present 5th Annual Y Golf Open
text:
ClubCorp and YMCA of Metro Atlanta Present 5th Annual Y Golf Open Where 
11:00 a.m. Monday, Oct. 5, 2015 Categories 
Events, Fundraisers, Sports ClubCorp and the YMCA of Metro Atlanta will host Atlanta’s largest charitable golf tournament, the 5th annual Y Golf Open, on Monday October 5. Last year this annual event raised $180,000 with nearly 1,000 players from 20 YMCA branches playing at eight ClubCorp private country clubs, the Y Golf Open grants scholarships for local youth in need to participate in meaningful Y programs. This year’s Y Golf Open will support initiatives that include: • Preschool & after school child care – providing a safe, nurturing environment for children to learn, grow and develop social skills • Summer camp – offers an exciting, supervised community for young people to explore the outdoors, build self-confidence, develop interpersonal skills and make lasting friendships and memories • Teen leadership – knowledge, character development, guidance, career exploration, and encouragement to help teens realize their potential • Youth sports & recreation – positive, fun activities that build athletic, social and interpersonal skills
